title: Unable to Connect to PVP.net
body:
My internet is working fine - can connect to any website
Log in to League - authenticates - "Logging in.."- "Failure - Unable to Connect to PVP.net"

Every single time

What is happening?

replies.body:
doesn't look like there is one yet - been seeing a few people with the same exact problem. might be a problem on League's end or the internet service provider.

kind of annoying, but it's technology. there's always going to be problems..
just tedious that riot doesn't respond to these types of situations via post. it'd be nice to be even aware that they acknowledge the issue

Even though your internet is fine, it can still have problems specifically connecting to our servers.  In this case it looks like there was an issue establishing a connection to the authentication server.  If you are still having any issues, go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get this fixed up.  Hopefully, all is well now!

UPDATE: I have now logged in. For 3 hours, it didn't work. 

Now it's working. Go try!
Still not working for me, Are you by chance in Washington state?

> [{quoted}](name=Virsuh,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=wftnc8Ha,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-09-19T16:15:40.269+0000)
>
> Still not working for me, Are you by chance in Washington state?

I can't connect to LOL either. I'm in Puyallup, WA.
LOL of course its the west coast. Well when it comes back up wanna play some normals? Won't say im good lol only Gold 5 but like playing with new people.
in Redmond, WA. I've been logged in just fine for 20 minutes. But it didn't work for about 3 hours.
Northwest British Columbia, hangs up here as well.
Yeah I got same thing going on for the last 1.5 hours...... West Coast Canada here.

I am also having the same issue, funny how you can put money into their pockets but they can't even have the courtesy to let us know there is an issue even if its the slightest. Or how they don't update their troubleshooting because it never works for anyone. Even when you go through every step, none of them work, then they take days to reply to you're ticket. So Annoying.
i have the same thing going on to me aswell
